org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Interface BlueprintConfigurationProcessor.PropertyUpdater

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlueprintConfigurationProcessor.MultipleHostTopologyUpdater, UnitUpdater
    Enclosing class:
    BlueprintConfigurationProcessor

    public static interface BlueprintConfigurationProcessor.PropertyUpdater
    Provides functionality to update a property value.

      • defaultUpdater

        static BlueprintConfigurationProcessor.PropertyUpdater defaultUpdater()
        Returns:
        the default updater to apply on user defined (blueprint + cluster template, not stack defaults) properties configuration properties that do not have a registered updater
